DigiGimbal


Shaker? I barely even know her! Real-time video motion smoothing without hardware or specialized camera equipment using Machine Learning methods (SURF keypoint detection & Kalman filtering) to stabilize shaky videos.

[Github] - Source Code

20 Games Challenge


Kalli's home-grown, fair-trade, non-GMO, all-organic arcade. Recreated classic 2D and 3D arcade and puzzle games in Unity & Godot game engines, including Pong, Frogger, Space Invaders, & Suika Game.

[Github] - Source Code

[itch.io] - Play Games in Browser

EyeWriter


A webcam eye-movement controlled keyboard for full body paralysis, stroke, and ALS patients. This project uses Haar Cascade classifiers and a modified version of the Viola-Jones algorithm to detect & process iris and pupil movement from the user's live webcam feed.

[Github] - Source Code

[YouTube] - View Demo

HIPHOP: Handy Image Processing for Highly Over-Caffeinated Programmers


A high-level Domain Specific Language (DSL) with high learnability and accessibility for novice users and non-programmers to build high efficiency image processing pipelines.

[Github] - Source Code
